select a.kinderinfoId, a.officeedu, a.subofficeedu, a.kindername, a.establish, a.edate, a.odate, a.addr, a.telno, a.hpaddr, a.opertime, a.POINT_X, a.POINT_Y, b.fire_avd_dt, b.gas_ck_dt, b.elect_ck_dt, b.PLYG_CK_RS_CD, b.PLYG_CK_DT
from KINDERINFO a, SAFETY b where a.kinderinfoid = b.safetyid
and b.fire_avd_dt like '2019%'
and b.gas_ck_dt like '2019%'
and b.elect_ck_dt like '2019%'
and b.plyg_ck_rs_cd = '적합' and plyg_ck_dt like '2019%'

select a.kinderinfoId, a.officeedu, a.subofficeedu, a.kindername, a.establish, a.edate, a.odate, a.addr, a.telno, a.hpaddr, a.opertime, a.POINT_X, a.POINT_Y, b.arql_chk_dt, b.fxtm_dsnf_chk_dt, b.mdst_chk_dt, b.ilmn_chk_dt from KINDERINFO a, SANITARY b where a.kindername=b.kindername
and b.arql_chk_dt like '2019%'
and b.fxtm_dsnf_chk_dt like '2019%'
and b.mdst_chk_dt like '2019%'
and b.ilmn_chk_dt like '2019%'

select a.kinderinfoId, a.officeedu, a.subofficeedu, a.kindername, a.establish, a.edate, a.odate, a.addr, a.telno, a.hpaddr, a.opertime, a.POINT_X, a.POINT_Y, b.clsrarea, b.phgrindrarea, b.hlsparea, b.ktchmssparea from KINDERINFO a, CLASSAREA b where a.kindername=b.kindername
and TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(b.clsrarea, 0, length(b.clsrarea)-1),'9999' ) >= 379
and TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(b.clsrarea, 0, length(b.clsrarea)-1),'9999' ) < 379
and TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(b.phgrindrarea , 0, length(b.phgrindrarea)-1),'9999') > 1
and TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(b.hlsparea , 0, length(b.hlsparea)-1),'9999') > 1
and TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(b.ktchmssparea , 0, length(b.ktchmssparea)-1),'9999') > 1

select a.kinderinfoId, a.officeedu, a.subofficeedu, a.kindername, a.establish, a.edate, a.odate, a.addr, a.telno, a.hpaddr, a.opertime, a.POINT_X, a.POINT_Y, b.spcn_thcnt, b.ntcnt, b.ntrt_thcnt, c.vhcl_oprn_yn from KINDERINFO a,TEACHER b, SCHOOLBUS c where a.kindername=b.kindername and a.kindername=c.kindername
and vhcl_oprn_yn like 'Y'
and spcn_thcnt >= 1
and ntcnt >= 1
and ntrt_thcnt >= 1
SELECT kinderinfoId, kindername, nvl(total,0), ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY nvl(to_number(total),0) desc) AS RANK FROM kinderinfo where ROWNUM <= 10
